پال مکبتھ نے 2015 میں ورلڈ چیمپئن شپ جیت: Paul McBeth 2015 World Championship winner? Paul McBeth 2015 disc golf world champion

2015 season He won all five Major events, disc golf's first Grand Slam, including his fourth World title and his first ever win at the USDGC, making him only the third man to win both the World and US titles in the same year (after Ken Climo and Barry Schultz).
